trans-unit.source: Description of a situation that has occurred and which is displayed in an app.

seg-source.mrk: Description of a situation that has occurred and which is displayed in an app.

target.mrk: 已發生且在應用程式中顯示的情況說明。

source.ph: <!--Location info: Hotspot in the Manage Situation Types app, object page, Situation Details section.-->

seg-source.ph: <!--Location info: Hotspot in the Manage Situation Types app, object page, Situation Details section.-->

target.ph: <!--Location info: Hotspot in the Manage Situation Types app, object page, Situation Details section.-->

trans-unit.source: You can enter a situation message that describes the business situation to the end user. When a situation instance based on this situation type occurs, the system displays this message in the corresponding app.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter a situation message that describes the business situation to the end user.
When a situation instance based on this situation type occurs, the system displays this message in the corresponding app.

target.mrk: 您可輸入情況訊息，向一般使用者說明業務情況。
發生以此情況類型為基礎的情況事例時，系統會在對應的應用程式中顯示此訊息。

trans-unit.source: Under <uicontrol>Short Description</uicontrol>, the name of the standard template is displayed by default. You can overwrite this name.

seg-source.mrk: Under <uicontrol>Short Description</uicontrol>, the name of the standard template is displayed by default.

target.mrk: 在 <uicontrol>[簡短說明]</uicontrol> 下，依預設會顯示標準範本名稱。

trans-unit.source: Under <uicontrol>Message Details</uicontrol>, you can enter detailed information that helps business users respond to a situation. The description of the standard template is displayed by default. You can overwrite this description. In the message text, you can enter up to 15 variables. As soon as you enter a curly bracket ({), a list of all available variables for this situation type is displayed. You can select the variable you need. from the list.

seg-source.mrk: Under <uicontrol>Message Details</uicontrol>, you can enter detailed information that helps business users respond to a situation.
The description of the standard template is displayed by default.
In the message text, you can enter up to 15 variables.
As soon as you enter a curly bracket ({), a list of all available variables for this situation type is displayed.
You can select the variable you need. from the list.

target.mrk: 在 <uicontrol>[訊息明細]</uicontrol> 下，您可輸入詳細資訊，以協助企業使用者回應情況。
依預設會顯示標準範本說明。
在訊息內文中，您最多可輸入 15 個變數。
若輸入大括弧 ({)，則會顯示此情況類型的所有可用變數清單。
您可自清單選擇所需變數。

trans-unit.source: Under <uicontrol>URL</uicontrol>, you can add a hyperlink to further information for the business user, for example, a procedure description for solving the situation. Under <uicontrol>Hyperlink Text</uicontrol>, you enter the description of the URL.

seg-source.mrk: Under <uicontrol>URL</uicontrol>, you can add a hyperlink to further information for the business user, for example, a procedure description for solving the situation.
Under <uicontrol>Hyperlink Text</uicontrol>, you enter the description of the URL.

target.mrk: 在 <uicontrol>[URL]</uicontrol> 下，您可將超連結新增至企業使用者進階資訊，例如：解決情況的程序說明。
在 <uicontrol>[超連結內文]</uicontrol> 下，您可輸入 URL 的說明。

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Message Preview</uicontrol> shows you all of the changes that you make to the text fields of the situation message in real-time.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Message Preview</uicontrol> shows you all of the changes that you make to the text fields of the situation message in real-time.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>[訊息預覽]</uicontrol> 會即時顯示情況訊息內文欄位的所有更改內容。
